寫作.definition: to write; to compose; writing; written works

寫字.definition: to write (by hand); to practice calligraphy

寫實.definition: realism; realistic portrayal; realistic; true to life

寫意畫.definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style

寫手.definition: person who writes articles - newspapers, magazines, blogs (informal); scribe; copyist; a talented writer of articles or of calligraphy

寫法.definition: style of writing (literary style); way of writing a character; spelling

寫生.definition: to sketch from nature; to do a still life drawing

寫真集.definition: photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model

寫道.definition: to write (used before or after a quoted passage)
